page.title: 03ANC.SITES,SUPERNAT.,PLACE N.
page.content: {Trewothack:}Ancient Tregose family seat.Probably monastery for monks and nuns.Site of private chapel_14th.C.Ancient foundations still traceable. {Lantinning:}Formerly cell of Benedictine monks. {Great & Little Dennis:}Two ancient entrenchments. {Boden:}Mentioned in origonal Domesday. Site of ancient camp. {Supernatural: }Ghost of lady walking down vicarage stairs_seen by Mr.Walters Eva in the sec.World War. {Place names:}Boden Vean -"lower man's abode". Condurrow _ "junction of waters". Gillywartha _ "higher grove". Gillan _ "nook" or "creek". Lantinning _ "holy place".
